body_html:
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements

According to this, gcc 6.4 is not supported by CUDA.
As we are building on top of CUDA, there is not much we can do on TF side until CUDA supports GCC 6.4.

According to this, gcc 6.4 is not supported by CUDA.

body:
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements

According to this, gcc 6.4 is not supported by CUDA.
As we are building on top of CUDA, there is not much we can do on TF side until CUDA supports GCC 6.4.
